answers.answer: Hi there!Zrytec has not been known to cause diabetes. Though some drug combinations may need to be used in caution in diabetics, plain zrytec does not have any side effects as such.Hope this information is helpful.Take care!

question: Would Zrytec  for (allergies) cause a Juvenile Type 1 sugar levels to go up?
title: does zyrtec mess with diabetes
